metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: 9. Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields:

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Creates the PDF so that it conforms to the selected ISO standard for long-term preservation of electronic documents. Security tab of the Adobe PDFMaker preferences The settings available for PDFMaker depend on the application in which you’re using PDFMaker.
You can now add any necessary fields to the agreement. Remember that a Signature field must be placed for each signer (including internal counter-singers). There are two methods to apply fields:
Specify the PDF/A or PDF/E compliance standard, or none.

• The Sign action is assigned by default. • The Sign action allows the participant to enter field data and sign the agreement. • Up to 50 participants are supported. • Each participant listed receives their own agreement. 2. Enter recipient email addresses followed by commas, or copy and paste a list of email addresses into the Email field. 3. Configure participant authentication by clicking the key icon to the right of the participant. • Email is the default authentication method for confirming the identity of each participant and is sufficient to obtain a legal signature in most cases. Password authentication can be added to increase security. When configured, the participant must enter the password before they can interact with the agreement.
